APEX Database Information
DB Information
Oracle Database 19c Enterprise Edition Release 19.0.0.0.0 - Production

For APEX 3.2 and below, DB must be 9.2.0.3 or above.
For APEX 4.0, DB must be 10.2.0.3 or above or 10g Express
For APEX 5.0, DB must be 11.1.0.7 or later including Enterprise Edition and Express Edition (Oracle Database XE)
For APEX 5.1 and 18.1, DB must be 11.2.0.4 or later including Enterprise Edition and Express Edition (Oracle Database XE)

Prior APEX Versions which May be Cleaned Up
Consider Removing All Listed
If your current APEX version is fully functional and backed up, consider removing earlier versions.
Generally, this involves dropping the schema for the previous version or versions. See the installation guide section entitled "About Removing Prior Oracle Application Express Installations" for more information.

Has APEX Been Used?
from apex_workspaces order by workspace_id * ERROR at line 3: ORA-00942: table or view does not exist
Workspace ID Workspace Name
Internal Workspaces have IDs less than 100,000.
Any Workspace ID >= 100,000 indicates APEX has been used. (In 12c Multi-Tenant, check only valid for PDB).
Database Service Name
DB Service Name
CIBERNET_gru188.sub04031341361.vcn01.oraclevcn.com

If in a 12c multi-tenant environment, the above is the service name of the CDB.
This query will show the service name of the PDB:
select name, pdb from cdb_services;
